name: What2Play
description: A web based app that gives users a randomized game suggestion based on the genre they're in the mood for!

name: Collarchive
description: A web based app that gives users the ability to digitally log a physical collection they own. The demo features items from my own personal collection!

name: Gym Planner
description: A straightforward web based app that gives users the ability to digitally plan, track and optimize their workouts. Each signed in user will get their own database of manually entered routines and exercises.

name: Avatar Yearbook
description: A digital yearbook for members of the General Assembly SEIR 'Avatar' Cohort.
